name: Re:Dead
description:
Battle against the monsters of the underworld in this fast-paced, third person hack-and-slash. Use your dashes and high mobility to maneuver around the underworld and kill as many monsters as you can.

"It's been a long time, but we're not done yet."

It's been a long time:  The longer you play, the more points the monsters will award to your score when you kill them. 

But we are not done yet:  Giving up is not an option. Arise from the dead and get a second chance to kill more monsters!

Use your surroundings to your advantage, buff yourself with more damage and lifesteal, dash to evade, teleport to your enemies and get the highest score you can!
